product_name: REI Sariska Stretch-Woven Full-Zip Jacket - Women's
long_description: Designed to wear to and from yoga sessions, the REI Sariska Stretch-Woven Full-Zip Jacket features warm, flexible fabrics and a feminine fit. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture off skin and dries quickly; 4-way stretch lets you wear jacket while warming up. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Tall collar and thumbhole cuffs let you extend warmth and coverage; jacket also has 2 handwarmer pockets. Front zip has a removable elastic zipper pull that doubles as an emergency hair tie. Ribbed-knit cuffs and hem band offer a comfortable fit. The REI Sariska Stretch-Woven Full-Zip Jacket offers an active fit that promotes a full range of motion.
short_description: Designed to wear to and from yoga sessions, the REI Sariska Stretch-Woven Full-Zip Jacket features warm, flexible fabrics and a feminine fit.
